name: Tanks (itch) (UnderCat39)
description:
Basicly Wii tanks but worse, you cant connect 2 Xbox controllers to play local multiplayer pvp though so that's cool.

kinda forgot to show the controls in game whoops, might as well do it here then

Mouse and Keyboard: ASWD for movement, Mouse for aiming and left click for shooting

Xbox:  Left joystick for movement, right joystick for aiming and left bumper for shooting
